Using Version Manager with Previous Releases

Version Manager 5.2 - 6.0

Projects created in Version Manager 5.2 through 6.0 can be used with the current release. However, to use some features, you must copy these older projects into project databases. This will make them inaccessible from any Version Manager release prior to 6.5.

Version Manager 6.5 - 7.x

Projects created in Version Manager 6.5 through 7.x can be used with the current release. However, if you use the Version Manager File Server to create a revision library, the projects will be inaccessible form any Version Manager release prior to 8.0.

See Also
